attributes.action: To make it  if any one has held a car licence for over 2 years can take a cbt and then be given full entital ment to ride up to 125 without taking a test
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: car drivers have full licence to ride a moped so why not the same right of full entitalment if taking a cbt for 125.we all know bikes are more economical this would create less polution to the enviroment and ease congestion and also make car drivers more aware of motorcycles.taking a cbt and then have only full entitlement to 125 without a testIf anything over 125 would need to take the test

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
